description_txt: stated on July 21, 2015 in an interview on "The Daily Show":
quote_txt: The United States is "fighting with Iraqis to defeat ISIS along with Iran. But in Yemen we're fighting Iran with Iraqis and Saudis."

description_txt: stated on July 21, 2015 in a campaign rally in South Carolina:
quote_txt: The five Guantanamo detainees swapped for Bowe Bergdahl "are right now back on the battlefield."

description_txt: stated on July 1, 2015 in a town hall meeting in Colebrook, N.H.:
quote_txt: The federal deficit would pay for 40 gallons of "New Hampshire maple syrup" for everyone in the United States.

description_txt: stated on July 15, 2015 in an interview on CNN's "New Day":
quote_txt: President Barack Obama "said at the beginning of the negotiations that the basic approach was to dismantle Iran’s nuclear program in exchange for dismantling the sanctions."

description_txt: stated on July 13, 2015 in an open letter to Floridians:
quote_txt: "Although we have twice the population of Greece, the state of Florida employs three times fewer government employees."

description_txt: stated on July 20, 2015 in a segment on his radio show:
quote_txt: "Al Franken said almost exactly what Trump said" about John McCain’s military record.

description_txt: stated on July 15, 2015 in an interview:
quote_txt: If women seeking an abortion see their ultrasound, "the odds are pretty high they're going to keep the baby."

description_txt: stated on July 9, 2015 in an online community forum:
quote_txt: The murder rate in Atlanta is on the rise this year.

description_txt: stated on July 17, 2015 in a campaign rally in Houston:
quote_txt: "We borrow a million dollars every minute."

description_txt: stated on July 17, 2015 in a town hall in Carson City, Nevada:
quote_txt: "A law was passed, apparently in the Clinton administration, about whether, in recruiting offices … Marines or other military should be able to have guns. Apparently it is prohibited."

description_txt: stated on July 19, 2015 in comments on ABC's This Week.:
quote_txt: Says John McCain "has done nothing to help the vets."

description_txt: stated on July 14, 2015 in in a Change.org petition:
quote_txt: "By declaring that Pluto was no longer a planet, the (International Astronomical Union) put into place a planetary definition that would have even declassified Earth as a planet if it existed as far from the sun as Pluto does."

description_txt: stated on July 10, 2015 in a radio interview:
quote_txt: Says Bill and Hillary Clinton attended Donald Trump's last wedding.

description_txt: stated on July 8, 2015 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says "Scott Walker’s bad budget includes: No weekend for workers."

description_txt: stated on July 16, 2015 in a tweet :
quote_txt: "ISIS supporter tweeted at 10:34 a.m. Shooting began at 10:45 a.m." in Chattanooga, Tenn.

description_txt: stated on July 14, 2015 in press release:
quote_txt: Georgia has more than 700 law enforcement agencies, and fewer than 20 percent of them are state-certified.

description_txt: stated on July 2, 2015 in a speech at the National Press Club:
quote_txt: "Texas’ high school graduation rate went from 27th in the country in 2002, to second highest in the country in 2013."

description_txt: stated on July 11, 2015 in a speech in Las Vegas:
quote_txt: "If you're from Syria and you're a Christian, you cannot come into this country" as a refugee.

description_txt: stated on July 5, 2015 in an interview:
quote_txt: "The actual deportations from the interior of the country are way down" under President Obama.

description_txt: stated on July 19, 2015 in comments on ABC's "This Week":
quote_txt: "Four times, I said, he (John McCain) is a hero, but you know ... people choose selective pieces."

description_txt: stated on July 19, 2015 in comments on CNN's "State of the Union":
quote_txt: The Iran deal "violates promises the president made to the American people." ... "It is not an anytime, anywhere inspection process."

description_txt: stated on May 27, 2015 in news conference:
quote_txt: "It’s commercial vehicles, 18 wheelers and above … that cause 90 plus percent of the damages on our highways and bridges."

description_txt: stated on July 13, 2015 in a speech to a pro-Israel Christian group:
quote_txt: "In a few months, this deal would give Iran $150 billion" for its $300 billion to $400 billion economy, which is "like $8 trillion flowing into the United States treasury."

description_txt: stated on June 24, 2015 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "Texas still owns all of its public lands. If the federal gov't wants to create a park, they must ask permission!"

description_txt: stated on July 14, 2015 in an appearance on "Hannity":
quote_txt: "Obama keeps talking about getting rid of all nuclear weapons. He’s already significantly reduced our capabilities there."

description_txt: stated on June 30, 2015 in a Twitter post:
quote_txt: The California governor "says yes to poisoning more children with mercury and aluminum" in vaccines.

description_txt: stated on July 10, 2015 in a headline on the website NewsExaminer:
quote_txt: "Christian Pastor in Vermont Sentenced to One Year in Prison After Refusing to Marry Gay Couple"

description_txt: stated on June 29, 2015 in a chain email:
quote_txt: Muslims "attempted to establish the first Islamic Sharia court inside the United States in the town of Irving, Texas."

description_txt: stated on July 15, 2015 in a press release:
quote_txt: Says Carlos Lopez-Cantera "even voiced enthusiastic support for bringing an Arizona-style immigration law to Florida, calling the measure 'common sense.’"

description_txt: stated on June 3, 2015 in an interview:
quote_txt: Says Scott Walker's views on abortion are more restrictive "than any Republican president in recent times."
